IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE COUNCIL IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION FORMED TO ADMINISTER THE GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION TEST, CONDUCT EDUCATIONAL RESEARCH AND TO PROVIDE OTHER EDUCATIONAL SERVICES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION COUNCIL (GMAC) BELIEVES THAT BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT ARE CRITICAL TO THE ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL WELL-BEING OF PEOPLE WORLDWIDE. WE PROVIDE INFORMATION AND INSIGHTS TO IMPROVE DECISION MAKING ABOUT THE DISCOVERY AND EVALUATION OF TALENT. AT GMAC, WE DO THIS TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE EFFECTIVE USE OF HUMAN, NATURAL, AND FINANCIAL RESOURCES THROUGHOUT THE WORLD.
IRS990.Desc: TEST OPERATIONS - GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION PROGRAMS EVALUATE APPLICANTS FROM MANY EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUNDS. THE GMAT HELPS SCHOOL PROGRAMS CHOOSE THE STUDENTS WHO ARE MOST LIKELY TO SUCCEED ACADEMICALLY IN A GIVEN PROGRAM. FOR LEADING BUSINESS SCHOOLS WORLDWIDE, THE GMAT IS RECOGNIZED AS THE MOST EFFECTIVE TEST AVAILABLE FOR MATCHING STUDENT COMPETENCIES WITH PROGRAM DEMANDS - REGARDLESS OF PROGRAM TYPE OR THE RACE, GENDER, OR NATIONAL ORIGIN OF STUDENTS. THE GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION TEST (GMAT) IS A CRITICAL PART OF THE SELECTIVE ADMISSIONS PROCESS FOR NEARLY 5,500 GRADUATE MANAGEMENT PROGRAMS AT 2,032 SCHOOLS AROUND THE WORLD. FOR MORE THAN 60 YEARS, SCHOOLS HAVE TRUSTED THE GMAT EXAM, A PROVEN AND RELIABLE MEASUREMENT, TO ASSESS CANDIDATES' SKILLS AND PREDICT THEIR SUCCESS IN GRADUATE BUSINESS CURRICULUM. IN MARCH 2015, GMGC INDIA ACQUIRED THE NMAT EXAM FROM NMIMS UNIVERSITY AND RENAMED IT TO NMAT BY GMAC. THIS EXAM ENABLES SCHOOLS TO RECRUIT TOP TALENT AND MEASURES SKILLS NEEDED TO SUCCEED IN LEADING MANAGEMENT PROGRAMS LOCATED IN INDIA.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES GMAT TEST REGISTRATIONS - 292,753 GMAT TESTS ACTUALLY TAKEN - 258,688 GMAT SCORE REPORTS SENT - 646,116 NMAT TEST REGISTRATIONS - 70,950 NMAT TESTS ACTUALLY TAKEN - 63,199 NMAT SCORE REPORTS SENT - 232,426NUMBER OF TEST CENTERS AS OF DEC 31, 2015: NORTH AMERICA - 412 ASIA PACIFIC - 85 EUROPE, MIDDLE EAST, AFRICA - 117 LATIN AMERICA - 34NUMBER OF ACTIVE PROGRAMS ACCEPTING THE GMAT AS OF DEC 31, 2015: NORTH AMERICA - 4,564 ASIA PACIFIC - 770 EUROPE, MIDDLE EAST, AFRICA - 1,166 LATIN AMERICA - 53

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: OTHER EDUCATIONAL SERVICES - SERVICES FOR STUDENTS:GMAC PROVIDES INFORMATION FOR STUDENTS ABOUT THE VALUE OF AND PROCESS FOR OBTAINING AN MBA DEGREE. THIS INFORMATION IS DELIVERED VIA WWW.MBA.COM, AS WELL AS THROUGH OTHER MEDIUMS AS APPROPRIATE. GMAC PROVIDES FREE GMAT TEST PREPARATION SOFTWARE TO STUDENTS. ALSO, GMAT PROVIDES FEE WAIVERS TO ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED STUDENTS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS WORTH $250 PER WAIVER, MARKET PRICE TO REGISTER FOR THE GMAT. FINALLY, GMAC SELLS VARIOUS TEST PREPARATION PRODUCTS, BOTH HARD COPY AND ONLINE.SERVICES FOR SCHOOLS:GMAC PROVIDES INFORMATION FOR SCHOOL PROFESSIONALS ABOUT POTENTIAL STUDENTS AND GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION TRENDS AND DEVELOPMENTS. THIS INFORMATION IS DELIVERED VIA WWW.GMAC.COM, AS WELL AS THROUGH OTHER MEDIUMS AS APPROPRIATE.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES WEBSITE VISITS TO GMAC.COM - 741,799THE GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION SEARCH SERVICE (GMASS) GIVES SCHOOL ADMISSION PROFESSIONALS ACCESS TO QUALIFIED POTENTIAL APPLICANTS WHO HAVE ALREADY SHOWN A STRONG INTEREST IN GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION. THEY'VE CREATED AN MBA.COM PROFILE, THEY MAY HAVE TAKEN THE GMAT EXAM AND THEY'VE SPECIFICALLY CHOSEN TO MAKE THEIR CONTACT AND OTHER INFORMATION AVAILABLE TO SCHOOLS. NAMES ARE SOLD INDIVIDUALLY AND THE DATABASE FREQUENTLY RENEWS AS INDIVIDUALS MOVE THROUGH THE DECISION MAKING PROCESS. WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF SEARCHES DONE - 16,246 TOTAL NUMBER OF GMASS SEARCHES COMPLETED IN CALENDAR YEAR 2015SCHOOL FINDER DATA WAREHOUSE CAPTURES BUSINESS SCHOOL ADMISSIONS, ENROLLMENT, AND EMPLOYMENT INFORMATION IN ON PLACE. THIS DATA, DEFINED BY THE MBA REPORTING CRITERIA IS AN IMPORTANT SOURCE OF OBJECTIVE, CONSISTENT, AND COMPARABLE INDUSTRY INFORMATION FOR PROSPECTIVE STUDENTS (VIA THE MBA.COM SCHOOL SEARCH SERVICE), BUSINESS SCHOOL PROFESSIONALS, AND THE MEDIA.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF SEARCHES DONE - 3,150,000 NUMBER OF PARTICIPATING SCHOOLS - 2,116 NUMBER OF PARTICIPATING PROGRAMS ESTIMATE - 6,356JOB OPENINGS IN GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION: TO SUPPORT THE GRADUATE BUSINESS SCHOOL COMMUNITY, GMAC MAINTAINS A CURRENT LIST OF PROFESSIONAL POSITIONS AT BUSINESS SCHOOLS AROUND THE WORLD. THESE OPENINGS ARE POSTED DIRECTLY BY THE SCHOOLS. GMAC SERVES AS THE CENTRAL SOURCE OF NEWS AND INFORMATION IN THE FIELD OF GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF JOB POSTINGS - 314GRADUATE MANAGEMENT NEWS: A FREE ONLINE NEWLETTER PUBLISHED MONTHLY TO KEEP SCHOOLS UP TO DATE ON TRENDS AND PROVIDES FEATURE ARTICLES ON HOT TOPICS IN THE BUSINESS SCHOOL COMMUNITY.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES GRADUATE MANAGEMENT NEWS EMAILS SENT - 237,082 GRADUATE MANAGEMENT NEWS PAGE VIEWS - 64,694THE GMAC LEADERSHIP CONFERENCE: THIS ANNUAL EVENT, GENERALLY HELD IN THE EARLY WINTER, IS OPEN TO ACADEMIC AND ADMINISTRATIVE GRADUATE SCHOOL PROGRAM-LEVEL DEANS AND DIRECTORS. ATTENDANCE IS LIMITED TO ENSURE A FOCUSED AND DRIVEN PROGRAM.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF TOTAL SCHOOL ATTENDEES - 158THE GMAC ANNUAL CONFERENCE IN JUNE BRINGS TOGETHER GRADUATE BUSINESS PROFESSIONALS FROM ALL FUNCTIONS AND EXPERIENCE LEVELS FOR NETWORKING, LEARNING SESSIONS, AND DISCUSSIONS ABOUT THE LATEST TRENDS IN GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION. WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF TOTAL SCHOOL ATTENDEES - 662THE ADMISSIONS INSTITUTE FOR NEW PROFESSIONALS, HELD IN THE SUMMER, IS DESIGNED FOR PROFESSIONALS FROM GMAT USING SCHOOLS WITH UP TO TWO YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN BUSINESS SCHOOL ADMISSIONS.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF TOTAL SCHOOL ATTENDEES - 59GMGC 2015 EUROPEAN CONFERENCE: THE EUROPEAN CONFERENCE IS DESIGNED FOR SCHOOL PROFESSIONALS IN ADMISSIONS, MARKETING, RECRUITMENT, INTERNATIONAL AFFAIRS, AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT. HELD IN THE FALL, THIS GLOBAL FORUM EXPLORES ISSUES OF INCREASING IMPORTANCE WITHIN A GROWING EUROPEAN GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION LANDSCAPE.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF ATTENDEES - 71 INSTITUTIONS REPRESENTED - 27 COUNTRIES REPRESENTED - 11GMAC 2015 ASIA PACIFIC CONFERENCE: THE APAC CONFERENCE IS DESIGNED FOR SCHOOL PROFESSIONALS IN ADMISSIONS, MARKETING, RECRUITMENT, INTERNATIONAL AFFAIRS, AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT. HELD IN THE FALL, THIS GLOBAL FORUM EXPLORES ISSUES OF INCREASING IMPORTANCE WITHIN A GROWING ASIA-PACIFIC GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION LANDSCAPE.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF ATTENDEES - 51 INSTITUTIONS REPRESENTED - 30 COUNTRIES REPRESENTED - 15THE GMAC MANAGEMENT EDUCATION FOR TOMORROW (MET) FUND FORMALIZES AND ENHANCES THE GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION COUNCIL'S LONG-STANDING COMMITMENT TO INVESTING (FINANCIAL AND IN-KIND) IN STRATEGIC PHILANTHROPIC INITIATIVES THAT BENEFIT AND ADVANCE BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT EDUCATION GLOBALLY.THE LARGEST PROJECT, THE IDEAS TO INNOVATION CHALLENGE, AWARDED MORE THAN $7.1 MILLION TO 12 PROGRAMS, INCORPORATING ONE OR MORE OF THE 20 IDEAS CHOSEN FROM THE CHALLENGE'S FIRST PHASE, ASKING FOR IDEAS ON HOW TO IMPROVE GRADUATE MANAGEMENT EDUCATION. THESE PROGRAMS ARE CREATING NEW EDUCATION OPPORTUNITIES IN THE US, CANADA, SPAIN, KENYA, BOTSWANA, GHANA AND MORE, AND WILL BE IMPLEMENTED BETWEEN 2013 AND 2017. IN ADDITION, THE FUND AWARDED $250,000 TO THE PHD PROJECT, TO HELP FURTHER ITS MISSION TO PROMOTE ADDITIONAL MINORITY FACULTY IN BUSINESS SCHOOLS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: RESEARCH - GMAC RESEARCH PROVIDES DATA ABOUT GMAT TEST TAKERS AND GRADUATE MANAGEMENT PROGRAM CONSTITUENTS.THE POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR GRADUATE BUSINESS EDUCATION CONTINUES TO DIVERSIFY, AND OFFERING THE GMAT EXAM ALLOWS GMAC TO BUILD AN ACCURATE PICTURE OF TODAY'S BUSINESS SCHOOL APPLICANTS. GMAT INTERACTIVE PROFILE REPORTS SHOW CURRENT AND HISTORICAL TEST-TAKER TRENDS ABOUT WHERE TEST TAKERS LIVE, WHAT THEY EXPECT TO GAIN FROM BUSINESS SCHOOL, THEIR WORK EXPERIENCE, ETC. SCHOOLS CAN ALSO CUSTOMIZE A REPORT FOR INFORMATION TARGETED TO FIT THEIR NEEDS. ALL REPORTS CAN BE PRINTED OR DOWNLOADED AT THE SCHOOL'S CONVENIENCE.GMAC SURVEYS EXPLORE RELEVANT ISSUES, OFFERING DATA AT VARIOUS DEPTHS, DEPENDING ON WHAT SCHOOLS NEED AND HOW THEY PARTICIPATE. SURVEY REPORTS ARE FREQUENTLY USED TO HELP DRIVE STRATEGIC DECISION-MAKING PROCESSES IN GRADUATE BUSINESS SCHOOLS.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF SURVEY REPORTS CREATED - 32 REPORTS: 7 SURVEY SUMMARY REPORTS; 6 SURVEY INTERACTIVE REPORTS; 4 OTHER INTERACTIVE REPORTS; 5 SURVEY BENCHMARK TOOLS; 9 DATA TO GO REPORTS; 1 RESEARCH REPORT (WHITE PAPER); 659 UNIQUE BENCHMARK REPORTS RUN BY SCHOOLS THROUGH INTERACTIVE BENCHMARK SYSTEM NUMBER OF ENTITIES SURVEYED - APPROXIMATELY - 76,11 NUMBER OF AD HOC REQUESTS ANSWERED - APPROXIMATELY 130 FOR MEMBER AND NON-MEMBER SCHOOLSGMAT VALIDITY STUDY SERVICE IS A CUSTOMER SERVICE THAT ANALYZES A SCHOOL'S ADMISSIONS CRITERIA AND LETS SCHOOLS KNOW EXACTLY HOW VALID THE TEST IS FOR ITS PROGRAM.WAYS TO MEASURE - 2015 VALUES NUMBER OF FULL VALIDITY STUDIES - 9

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COUNCIL IS EXEMPT FROM THE PAYMENT OF INCOME TAXES ON ITS EXEMPT ACTIVITIES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC). THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE HAS DETERMINED THAT THE COUNCIL IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A)(2) OF THE IRC. THE COUNCIL IS REQUIRED TO REPORT UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TO THE IRS. THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS THE INCOME TAX STANDARD FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND, ACCORDINGLY, HAS EVALUATED ITS TAX POSITIONS AND DETERMINED THAT ITS TAX POSITIONS ARE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT TO BE SUSTAINED ON EXAMINATION. THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO REVIEW AND EXAMINATION BY FEDERAL, STATE, LOCAL AND FOREIGN AUTHORITIES.

RltdOrgOfficerTrstKeyEmplGrp.TitleTxt: CHIEF HR OFFICER, GENERAL COUNSEL AN

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: -ACCORDING TO GMAC TRAVEL POLICY FOR VICE PRESIDENTS AND ABOVE, GMAC WILL REIMBURSE FOR COACH-CLASS AIR TRAVEL FOR ONE-WAY FLIGHTS LESS THAN 2.5 HOURS IN DURATION. IF THE FLIGHT IS 2.5 HOURS OR LONGER, GMAC WILL COVER THE COST OF THE NEXT TICKET CLASS. FIRST CLASS TRAVEL IS ALLOWED FOR THE CEO. -THE GROSS PAYMENTS TO THE INDIVIDUAL WERE INSIGNIFICANT AND RELATE TO STAFF ANNIVERSARY RECOGNITIONS AND AWARDS. AS REQUIRED BY TAX LAW, ANY APPROPRIATE AMOUNTS ARE INCLUDED IN THE COMPENSATION OF THE INDIVIDUAL.
MARGARET JOBST, SEVERANCE, $387,189 SHELLI H. ARNOLD, SEVERANCE, $418,069
INCLUDED IN THE AMOUNT OF RETIREMENT AND DEFERRED COMPENSATION FOR SANGEET CHOWFLA IS A DEFERRED COMPENSATION INCENTIVE PLAN ACCRUAL OF $260,000 FOR 2015.

THE TOTAL AMOUNT REPORTED IN COLUMN B(II)INCLUDES A RETENTION BONUS FOR THE FOLLOWING INDIVIDUALS IN 2015: ASHOK SARATHY $75,000 DAVID MOLDAVSKY $75,000 MARGARET JOBST $150,000 SHERRI SAMPSON $75,000 SAMUEL REIMER $150,000 SHELLI H. ARNOLD $150,000 ASHISH BHARDWAJ $60,848

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION COUNCIL HAS ONE CLASS OF MEMBERS - GRADUATE BUSINESS MANAGEMENT SCHOOLS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ELECT THE DEAN AND REPRESENTATIVE DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS ONE CLASS OF MEMBERS. DECISIONS THAT REQUIRE THEIR APPROVAL ARE AMENDMENTS TO THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND REVISIONS TO THE BYLAWS. EACH MEMBER HAS EQUAL VOTING RIGHTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS GIVEN ELECTRONIC ACCESS TO A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WHILE IN DRAFT FORM (PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE IRS) AND ASKED TO REVIEW AND SUBMIT COMMENTS TO GMAC MANAGEMENT PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH DIRECTOR, OFFICER AND KEY EMPLOYEE HAS AN ONGOING OBLIGATION TO DISCLOSE POTENTIAL OR ACTUAL CONFLICTS. FOR DIRECTORS, THE PROFESSIONAL STANDARDS COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR REVIEWING AND DETERMINING WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS. THIS COMMITTEE MAKES A RECOMMENDATION TO THE BOARD CONCERNING ANY RESTRICTIONS TO BE PLACED ON THE CONFLICTED DIRECTOR. FOR EMPLOYEES, THE CEO AND THE GENERAL COUNSEL REVIEW POTENTIAL OR ACTUAL CONFLICTS, DETERMINE WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS, AND RECOMMEND ACTION. RESTRICTIONS RANGE FROM RECUSAL TO TERMINATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION OF THE CEO. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE ANNUALLY REVIEWS AND APPROVES GMAC CORPORATE GOALS AND OBJECTIVES, EVALUATES THE CEO'S PERFORMANCE IN LIGHT OF SUCH GOALS AND OBJECTIVES AND DETERMINES COMPENSATION BASED ON THIS EVALUATION AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH ANY APPLICABLE EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT. THE COMMITTEE RETAINS AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTANT TO ASSIST IN EVALUATING PERFORMANCE, INCLUDING OBTAINING AN ANNUAL COMPARABILITY ANALYSIS AS APPROPRIATE TO COMPLY WITH THE "REBUTTABLE PRESUMPTION" UNDER THE INTERMEDIATE SANCTIONS RULES OF IRC SECTION 4958. THE CEO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION OF TOP MANAGEMENT. GMAC RETAINS INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTANTS AND REPUTABLE SALARY SURVEY MARKET DATA TO EVALUATE COMPENSATION COMPARABILITY. THE CEO REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION DATA ANNUALLY FOR ALL OFFICERS (MOST RECENT YEAR IS 2015). EVERY TWO YEARS A COMPENSATION ANALYSIS IS CONDUCTED FOR ALL EMPLOYEES. THE CEO AND CHIEF HR OFFICER REVIEW THE DATA AND DETERMINE APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION (MOST RECENT YEAR IS 2014).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GMAC MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. FINANCIAL STATEMENT ARE GENERALLY INCLUDED IN THE ANNUAL REPORT.

GMAC IS AN U.S. ORGANIZATION THAT OWNS 100% OF THE THREE FOREIGN DISREGARDED ENTITIES (GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION COUNCIL (HK), GRADUATE MANAGEMENT ADMISSION COUNCIL (INDIA) PRIVATE LTD. AND GRADUATE MANAGEMENT GLOBAL CONNECTION (UK) LIMITED.
